name: ABCi Interactive
tag_list: social-media, internet, technology, clicks, page-impressions, uniques, visitors, cpc, website, audit, digital, accreditation, third-party, verification, traffic, enewsletter, mobile, interactive, advertising, publishing, web
overview:
ABCi Interactive is a subsidiary of the Audit Bureau of Circulations (ABC). It provides publishers of interactive media independent third-party audits.

ABCi Interactive is one of the industry’s most experienced auditors of digital media. As a tripartite, nonprofit, independent association, ABC is an industry forum of North America’s leading publishers, advertisers, and ad agencies. ABCi offers a broad portfolio of interactive auditing solutions sure to meet any Web publisher’s needs. The experienced auditing staff has conducted thousands of interactive audits ranging from basic Web site traffic verification and social network audits to customized accreditation programs.

As the leading third-party media auditing organization in North America, the Audit Bureau of Circulations (ABC), provides credible, independently verified information essential to the media buying and selling process. ABCâ€™s interactive division, ABCi, provides a variety of interactive audit services to meet the growing demand for online accountability, including online traffic activity, e-newsletter delivery and online ad delivery verification. Innovative reporting options allow members to incorporate a wide-range of media products on one report to best reflect todayâ€™s expanding media portfolios. From setting standards and rules for print media to providing credibility for the burgeoning online advertising industry, ABC serves as a forum for the worldâ€™s leading magazine and newspaper publishers, advertisers and agencies.

milestones.description: Clearspring Technologies successfully completed ABCi Interactive's Digital Technology Accreditation program in 2008. (2008)
milestones.source_description: ABC Interactive Announces New Technology Accreditation Program

milestones.description: AdJuggler Inc.'s ad-serving technology has been audited and accredited by ABCi. (4/09)
